My Timeline

  • Software Engineer

    Capgemini India Pvt Ltd

    September 2020 - Present

    Capgemini SE is a French multinational corporation that provides consulting, technology, professional, and outsourcing services. It is headquartered in Paris, France. Capgemini has over 270,000 employees in over 50 countries, of whom nearly 120,000 are in India.

  • High School

    Kendriya Vidyalaya Hasimara

    2013 - 2014

    I did my high-school from Kendriya Vidyalaya Hasimara, West Bengal. I was className monitor, member of debate club, chorous. I was also the lead of high-school girl's basketball team. I secured a good rank in Informatics Olympiad organized by Silver Zone. I was also an active member of scouts and guide and experienced a lot of adventure in there.

Abhinav Rai

I am a public speaker and a passionate developer, I have an experience in front-end development, UI/UX and python and I am currently exploring Backend Development and AI.
